              "field": "order_id",

              "field": "order_item_id",
              "agg": "count",
              "alias": "item_count"

            "type": "logical",
            "op": "and",
            "clauses": [
              {
                "type": "comparison",
                "entity": "order_items",
                "field": "order_id",
                "op": "is_not_null"

          "case_sensitivity": false
